Games.gameDescription: Honkai: Star Rail is a role-playing gacha video game developed by miHoYo, published by miHoYo in mainland China and worldwide by Cognosphere, d/b/a HoYoverse. It was released on April 26, 2023, for Windows and mobile devices; with the PlayStation 5 port released on October 11, 2023.

Teamfight Tactics is an auto battler game developed and published by Riot Games. The game is a spinoff of League of Legends and is based on Dota Auto Chess, where players compete online against seven other opponents by building a team to be the last one standing.

Games.Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
Games.GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or AMD RX 470
Games.gameDescription: Call of Duty is a video game series and media franchise published by Activision, starting in 2003. The games were first developed by Infinity Ward, then by Treyarch and Sledgehammer Games. Several spin-off and handheld games were made by other developers.
NBA 2K24 builds on the NBA 2K franchise with enhanced features and gameplay, delivering animations and movements pulled from real-world action on the court for a groundbreaking jump in authenticity.

Games.Processor: AMD FX4350 or Intel Core i3-6300
Games.gameDescription: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale-hero shooter game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts. It was released for PlayStation 4, Windows, and Xbox One in February 2019, for Nintendo Switch in March 2021, and for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S in March 2022.

Valorant is a free-to-play first-person tactical hero shooter developed and published by Riot Games, for Windows. Teased under the codename Project A in October 2019, the game began a closed beta period with limited access on April 7, 2020, followed by a release on June 2, 2020.
